summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via a new /revoke-ownership route, an AppHeader nav item, and a Dashboard quick action that routes into a vehicle-selection + PIN-gated revoke flow. REQ-3 is partially evidenced (post-registration navigation to Vehicle Detail is added), but the diff summary does not clearly show the required explicit 'View Details' affordance on each vehicle in the vehicles list. The diff also includes several unrelated/unrequested changes (i18n/provider wiring, PWA/service worker/manifest edits, admin/profile/about/auth refactors), including modifications to files listed as immutable in the constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Vehicles list makes it explicit how to open vehicle details (e.g., an explicit "View Details" button/affordance on each vehicle card, in English).
missing_requirements.reason: The VehiclesPage.tsx diff excerpt is truncated before the vehicle list rendering, and the visible portion does not show any per-vehicle "View Details" UI or navigation to `/vehicles/$vehicleId`. Without explicit evidence in the provided diff summary, this acceptance criterion cannot be confirmed as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced or re-wired app-wide i18n / I18nProvider support (including wrapping the app entry point).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; also conflicts with the constraint forbidding edits to `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt: "frontend/src/main.tsx": "Application entry point wrapping the app with I18nProvider..."

hallucinated_features.description: Modified protected/immutable authentication/actor hook files (useActor.ts and possibly others).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and explicitly disallowed by constraints (do not edit `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts` and other immutable auth hooks).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed PWA/service-worker/manifest and index.html metadata behavior (cache strategy, manifest icon rules, meta description).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; unrelated to exposing revocation entry points or Vehicle Detail discoverability.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded About page content and admin contact details.
Admin token management and admin dashboard stats features (invite tokens page, system stats hook).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3 and outside the described scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile page redesign/feature expansion (PIN create/update UI and account management changes).
Backend API contract/type changes for activation tokens (generate/redeem activation token methods).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3 and potentially conflicts with the constraint to avoid backend/service changes (even though this is a frontend type contract change).
